translation.en: -Could I have a beer? -[man 1] Of course.
translation.es: - ¿Me das una cerveza? - Claro.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man 1] I'll get you one.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Te traeré una.

translation.en: [man 1] Why did you agree to meet me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué aceptaste reunirte conmigo?

translation.en: It's an interesting story, and, um…
translation.es: Es una historia interesante y…

translation.en: I've got a different perspective.
translation.es: tengo una perspectiva diferente.

translation.en: [chanting] Sieg Heil! Sieg Heil! Sieg Heil!
translation.es: ¡Sieg Heil!

translation.en: [man 2] I spent 10 years undercover in the far right.
translation.es: Pasé diez años infiltrado en la extrema derecha.

translation.en: It was so much worse than I thought it was going to be. Really.
translation.es: Fue mucho peor de lo que pensé. En serio.

translation.en: It was hardcore.
translation.es: Era muy intenso.

translation.en: The first years, especially, it was like full-on Nazi,
translation.es: Los primeros años, sobre todo, fue nazismo absoluto,

translation.en: and people were, like, competing to be as radical as possible.
translation.es: y la gente competía por ser lo más radical posible.

translation.en: And there was talk about starting a race war.
translation.es: Y se hablaba de comenzar una guerra racial.

translation.en: Yeah, the race war.
translation.es: Sí, la guerra racial.

translation.en: We would come to a time where we needed to, like, kill people.
translation.es: Llegaría el momento en que necesitaríamos matar gente.

translation.en: [man 2] And we'd have hit lists.
translation.es: Y tendríamos listas negras.

translation.en: And then, like, you'd have, like, the bomb makers themselves.
translation.es: Y luego estarían los fabricantes de bombas en sí.

translation.en: [man 2] In the 1990s, there was trouble in the streets.
translation.es: En los noventa, había problemas en las calles.

translation.en: A lot of tension.
translation.es: Mucha tensión.

translation.en: All someone had to do was light a match.
translation.es: Solo hacía falta que alguien encendiera una mecha.

translation.en: But we didn't think anyone was really gonna do it.
translation.es: Pero no pensamos que alguien realmente fuera a hacerlo.

translation.en: But then one person did.
translation.es: Pero una persona lo hizo.

translation.en: [man 3, on recording] This interview is being tape-recorded.
translation.es: Esta entrevista se está grabando.

translation.en: I am Detective Sergeant Terrence Boland,
translation.es: Soy el sargento detective Terrence Boland,

translation.en: attached to the Anti-Terrorist branch at New Scotland Yard.
translation.es: de la rama antiterrorista de New Scotland Yard.

translation.en: The other officer present is…
translation.es: El agente presente es…

translation.en: [Johnstone] Detective Constable Philip Johnstone
translation.es: Policía detective Philip Johnstone,

translation.en: from the Anti-Terrorist branch of New Scotland Yard.
translation.es: de la rama antiterrorista de New Scotland Yard.

translation.en: [Boland] Today is the 1st of May, 1999,
translation.es: Hoy es 1 de mayo de 1999,

translation.en: and the time is now 18:13 according to my watch.
translation.es: y ahora son las 18:13, según mi reloj.

translation.en: [Boland] You know, the whole idea of us sitting here
translation.es: El objetivo de que estemos aquí sentados

translation.en: is to get to the truth.
translation.es: es llegar a la verdad.

translation.en: [suspect] I'd just be the spark, that's all.
translation.es: Yo solo era la chispa, es todo.

translation.en: The spark that would set fire to this country.
translation.es: La chispa que prendería fuego a este país.

translation.en: The thoughts, they were getting stronger and stronger.
translation.es: Los pensamientos eran cada vez más fuertes.

translation.en: I just couldn't get it out of my head.
translation.es: No podía dejar de pensar.

translation.en: My destiny, you know?
translation.es: Mi destino, ¿sabes?

translation.en: Eventually, I woke up one morning, and I weren't thinking about it anymore.
translation.es: Finalmente, me desperté una mañana y ya no pensaba en eso.

translation.en: I was gonna do it.
translation.es: Iba a hacerlo.

translation.en: [Johnstone] When were you intending to blow it up?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo pensabas hacerla explotar?

translation.en: [suspect] Saturday.
translation.es: El sábado.

translation.en: Half past five.
translation.es: A las cinco y media.

translation.en: ♪ But don't worry ♪ ♪ Don't panic ♪
translation.es: SÁBADO

translation.en: That beautiful morning
translation.es: Esa hermosa mañana

translation.en: everybody was everywhere,
translation.es: había gente por todas partes,

translation.en: the sunshine, Brixton was bubbly,
translation.es: el sol brillaba, Brixton estaba alegre

translation.en: and people were doing their own things.
translation.es: y la gente se dedicaba a lo suyo.

translation.en: [fruit vendor] Peaches, plum, nectarines! There are strawberries! Come on!
translation.es: ¡Melocotones, ciruelas, nectarinas! ¡Hay fresas! ¡Vamos!

translation.en: We got Harrod's fruit at Woolworth's prices!
translation.es: ¡Hay fruta de Harrods al precio de Woolworths!

translation.en: Brixton is amazing place to be.
translation.es: Brixton es un lugar increíble.

translation.en: It's a historical place to be, you know?
translation.es: Es un lugar histórico, ¿sabes?

translation.en: This is where all the Black people
translation.es: Aquí es donde todos los negros

translation.en: came to first in London.
translation.es: llegaron a Londres.

translation.en: People work together, people live together.
translation.es: La gente trabaja junta, vive junta.

translation.en: We knew people from all over the world.
translation.es: Conocíamos gente de todo el mundo.

translation.en: People selling everything and everywhere,
translation.es: La gente vende de todo y en todas partes,

translation.en: getting their penny from where they can.
translation.es: y se gana la vida como puede.

translation.en: [CD vendor] Yeah, that's £2, darling.
translation.es: Son dos libras, cariño.

translation.en: [man 4] We got all the C-- every CD in the charts.
translation.es: - Teníamos todos los cedés populares. - Todos.

translation.en: [man 5] Snoop Dogg… [man 4] Michael Jackson, Madonna.
translation.es: Snoop Dogg, Michael Jackson, Madonna.

translation.en: I actually had an adult film made by Snoop Dogg.
translation.es: Tenía una película porno hecha por Snoop Dogg.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: -Pirate it-- But I never watched it. -We never sold that.
translation.es: - Era pirata. Pero nunca la vi. - Nunca la vendimos.

translation.en: -We did. -Didn't think so. All right then.
translation.es: - Sí. - No lo creo. Bien.

translation.en: [man 4] Sorta Robin Hoods. In their eyes, we were Robin Hoods,
translation.es: Como Robin Hood. Para ellos, éramos como Robin Hood, pero no para Our Price.

translation.en: but not in Our Price's eyes anyway. Our Price used to be over the road,
translation.es: Para ellos, éramos como Robin Hood, pero no para Our Price. Our Price estaba enfrente

translation.en: and we used to say things like, "This is my price, not Our Price."
translation.es: y decíamos cosas como "Este es mi precio, no el de ellos".

translation.en: We had a lot of rhymes.
translation.es: Teníamos muchas rimas.

translation.en: "Didn't fall off a lorry, had to jump and get it myself."
translation.es: "No me llegó ilegalmente, yo fui ilegalmente por él".

translation.en: "I don't care if you're in the game or out the fucking game, half the shopping store prices."
translation.es: "Vendas o no piratería, reduce a la mitad los precios de las tiendas".

translation.en: -Really liked that. High-five. -[laughs]
translation.es: Esa me gustaba. Choca esos cinco.

translation.en: -Don't leave it hanging. -[both laughing]
translation.es: Vamos. No me dejes así.

translation.en: [woman 1] Coconut!
translation.es: ¡Coco!

translation.en: Coconut, coconut, very fresh here.
translation.es: Coco. Está muy fresco aquí.

translation.en: We were all there, a happy, lovely day.
translation.es: Estábamos todos ahí. Era un día feliz y hermoso.

translation.en: All of a sudden, my neighbor said to me,
translation.es: De repente, mi vecino me dijo:

translation.en: "Wow, Talent, there is a bag here,
translation.es: "Talento, hay una bolsa aquí

translation.en: and I can hear the noise."
translation.es: y escucho un ruido".

translation.en: I said, "What sound are you hearing?" He said, "Come and see."
translation.es: Dije: "¿Qué sonido oyes?". Dijo: "Ven a ver".

translation.en: So, I came out of my stall,
translation.es: Así que salí de mi puesto

translation.en: and it was going… [rhythmically] "Tinkum, tinkum, tinkum, tinkum, tink--"
translation.es: y sonaba así:

translation.en: That was just the sound in that black bag.
translation.es: Ese era el sonido de esa bolsa negra.

translation.en: [man 4] It could've been gold bullion. It could've been loads of drugs.
translation.es: Podían haber sido lingotes de oro, un montón de drogas

translation.en: It could've been loads of money. It weren't our bag.
translation.es: o mucho dinero. No era nuestra bolsa.

translation.en: I opened it up, I had my face in it
translation.es: La abrí, metí la cara y luego dije…

translation.en: and then we're like, "It's a bomb."
translation.es: La abrí, metí la cara y luego dije… "Es una bomba".

translation.en: Then it's like, "Is it a bomb?" I'm not a bomb expert,
translation.es: Luego dije: "¿Es una bomba?". No soy experto en bombas, pero supe que lo era cuando la vi.

translation.en: but I knew it was a bomb when I see it.
translation.es: No soy experto en bombas, pero supe que lo era cuando la vi.

translation.en: And I'd never seen a bomb before.
translation.es: Nunca había visto una.

translation.en: It was like a cartoon bomb, you know?
translation.es: Era como una bomba de caricatura.

translation.en: -Yeah. -With a clock, ding-a-ling, and all that.
translation.es: - Sí. - Con un reloj, una campana y todo eso.

translation.en: -So, you kinda just know. -The alarm clocks with the old bells.
translation.es: - Así que lo sabes. - Los despertadores con las campanillas.

translation.en: With the bells on.
translation.es: Con campanillas.

translation.en: -The round face clock in a Tupperware box. -It was like that.
translation.es: - Un reloj redondo en una caja. - Era así.

translation.en: [man 5] And outside-- Coming out the box was wires, and they were going…
translation.es: Y afuera… Salían cables de esa caja que iban…

translation.en: -[man 4] Into a brown block-- box. -[man 5] …into a box full of nails.
translation.es: - A un bloque marrón. - …a una caja llena de clavos.

translation.en: I said, "Call the police, call the police"
translation.es: Dije: "Llama a la policía",

translation.en: because we don't know what was happening or who kept the bag there,
translation.es: porque no sabíamos qué sucedía ni quién tenía la bolsa ahí,

translation.en: because there was nobody there.
translation.es: porque no había nadie ahí.

translation.en: So, I walked back into my stall by the time-- to attend to my customers.
translation.es: Así que regresé a mi puesto para atender a mis clientes.

translation.en: I remember walking off, going, "I ain't having none of this,"
translation.es: Recuerdo que me alejé pensando: "No quiero lidiar con esto"

translation.en: and then coming back.
translation.es: y luego volví.

translation.en: I remember the guy,
translation.es: Recuerdo al tipo…

translation.en: like, people was going, "Oh, don't be so stupid."
translation.es: La gente decía: "No seas tonto. Tírala a la basura y llévala allá.

translation.en: "Put it in the bin, wheel it down there, never happened."
translation.es: La gente decía: "No seas tonto. Tírala a la basura y llévala allá. Olvida que sucedió".

translation.en: It was mad-- It was like no one knew what to do.
translation.es: Era una locura. Nadie sabía qué hacer.

translation.en: No one would believe this story. I've told this story many times.
translation.es: Nadie creía esta historia. La he contado muchas veces.

translation.en: A crackhead took the bomb out of the bag and nicked the bag.
translation.es: Un drogadicto sacó la bomba y se robó la bolsa.

translation.en: "Nah, you're joking me." "No way did it happen."
translation.es: "No. Bromeas. Eso no pudo haber pasado".

translation.en: "Yes, I swear down. It happened, man."
translation.es: "Sí, lo juro. Sucedió, amigo".

translation.en: -Even now there's crackheads-- -The crackhead come from this angle.
translation.es: - Incluso ahora hay drogadictos… - El drogadicto venía de acá.

translation.en: [whistles] He come kind of from, like--
translation.es: Venía de atrás del puesto

translation.en: from around the stall, picked it up.
translation.es: Venía de atrás del puesto y la recogió.

translation.en: At this time, we're going, "Leave the fucking bag, you nutter. It's a bomb."
translation.es: Entonces dijimos: "Deja la puta bolsa, loco. Es una bomba".

translation.en: Where he's touching the bomb, everyone's going, "What are you doing?"
translation.es: Tocó la bomba y todos preguntaron: "¿Qué haces?".

translation.en: Everyone can see the bomb now, he took it out.
translation.es: Todos podían verla porque la sacó.

translation.en: It's there, it's blatantly there, and he just gradually--
translation.es: Estaba ahí abiertamente y él poco a poco…

translation.en: He just went like that… [clicks tongue] …took the bag, and walked off up the road.
translation.es: Hizo esto… Tomó la bolsa y se fue caminando.

translation.en: He wanted the bag. He just took the bag. I mean--
translation.es: Quería la bolsa. Solo eso se llevó.

translation.en: The security guard phoned the police, the police come over--
translation.es: - Digo… - El guardia llamó a la Policía. La policía vino.

translation.en: As the police walked over I went, "That's a bomb."
translation.es: Conforme la policía se acercaba, dije: "Eso es una bomba".

translation.en: [officer, on megaphone] Everyone move back, please! Thank you.
translation.es: Retrocedan todos, por favor. Gracias.

translation.en: I don't remember landing or getting thrown off my feet.
translation.es: No recuerdo haber aterrizado ni haber sido arrojado.

translation.en: -All I remember is getting off the floor. -[man 4] Exactly.
translation.es: - Solo recuerdo que me levanté del piso. - Exacto.

translation.en: Just getting off the floor.
translation.es: Solo que me levanté.

translation.en: -I could hear you shout at me. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Te oí gritar. - Sí.

translation.en: -He was screaming out my name. -That was after.
translation.es: - Gritaba mi nombre. - Eso fue después.

translation.en: [man 5] I found him on a stretcher underneath, um, a bus stop.
translation.es: Lo hallé en una camilla debajo de una parada de autobús.

translation.en: "I'm over here, Lee."
translation.es: "Estoy aquí, Lee".

translation.en: I had to dodge… under my trolley.
translation.es: Tuve que ocultarme debajo de mi carrito.

translation.en: I didn't think anybody survived,
translation.es: No creí que nadie sobreviviría,

translation.en: because it was like the whole building collapsed on everybody.
translation.es: porque fue como si todo el edificio se derrumbara sobre todos.

translation.en: I got a little nail in the leg.
translation.es: Un clavo me dio en la pierna.

translation.en: I can't believe he didn't get hit. He was in front. That's mad.
translation.es: Es increíble que no saliera herido. Estaba enfrente. Qué locura.

translation.en: There's people with, like, limbs missing, with nails in their head, I thought,
translation.es: Había gente sin extremidades, con clavos en la cabeza. Pensé:

translation.en: "Why do I need to waste a stretcher going to hospital with a nail?"
translation.es: "¿Por qué desperdiciar una camilla para ir al hospital por un clavo?".

translation.en: -[man 5] They cut his jeans up. -[Lee] It hit me in the leg.
translation.es: - Le cortaron los jeans. - Me dio en la pierna.

translation.en: So, me mum just bought me these for me birthday.
translation.es: Mi mamá me los compró de cumpleaños.

translation.en: "Don't cut my jeans! My mum got me these for my birthday." I'll never forget that.
translation.es: "¡No los corten! Mi mamá me los dio de cumpleaños". Nunca lo olvidaré.

translation.en: [Talent] There were glasses all over the place.
translation.es: Había vidrios por todos lados.

translation.en: Because I wasn't hurt,
translation.es: Como no salí herida…

translation.en: I was grateful for that.
translation.es: estaba agradecida por eso.

translation.en: Most people around there,
translation.es: Casi todos los que estaban ahí…

translation.en: there were lots of casualties.
translation.es: Hubo muchas víctimas.

translation.en: Everybody were running all over the place
translation.es: Todos corrían por todos lados

translation.en: trying to find out if their loved ones are safe.
translation.es: intentando averiguar si sus seres queridos estaban a salvo.

translation.en: It was a horror in the day.
translation.es: Fue un horror ese día.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Did you think of the consequences?
translation.es: ¿Pensaste en las consecuencias?

translation.en: [suspect] No.
translation.es: No.

translation.en: On the train, I just kept imagining it exploding.
translation.es: En el tren, solo imaginaba que explotaba.

translation.en: I had to do it.
translation.es: Tuve que hacerlo.

translation.en: I was like a robot.
translation.es: Era como un robot.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Did you think of the…
translation.es: ¿Pensaste en la…

translation.en: the people?
translation.es: gente?

translation.en: [suspect] No.
translation.es: No.

translation.en: Not at all.
translation.es: Para nada.

translation.en: [man 6] Thirty-nine people were injured,
translation.es: Treinta y nueve personas resultaron heridas,

translation.en: including a child with a four-inch nail
translation.es: incluido un niño con un clavo de diez centímetros

translation.en: embedded in their skull.
translation.es: incrustado en el cráneo.

translation.en: The combination of burns and blast injuries
translation.es: La combinación de quemaduras y heridas por explosión

translation.en: with severe shrapnel injuries is a very difficult thing to deal with.
translation.es: con lesiones graves de metralla es algo muy difícil de manejar.

translation.en: This bomb was designed to kill as many people as possible,
translation.es: Esta bomba fue diseñada para matar a la mayor cantidad de gente posible,

translation.en: and it is miraculous that nobody lost their life on that day.
translation.es: y es un milagro que nadie haya perdido la vida ese día.

translation.en: The whole design of a nail bomb
translation.es: El diseño de una bomba de clavos

translation.en: is-- is to do the maximum amount of harm
translation.es: es causar el mayor daño a la mayor cantidad de gente

translation.en: to the maximum number of people, to kill as many people as possible.
translation.es: es causar el mayor daño a la mayor cantidad de gente para matar a cuanta gente sea posible.

translation.en: Putting fragments of metal inside a bomb
translation.es: Poner fragmentos de metal dentro de una bomba

translation.en: and-- and then exploding,
translation.es: y luego hacerla explotar

translation.en: it's going to carry this metal
translation.es: arroja este metal

translation.en: 300 miles an hour.
translation.es: a 480 kilómetros por hora.

translation.en: Nails are accompanied by anything else
translation.es: Los clavos van acompañados de cualquier otra cosa

translation.en: that the blast wave picks up on the way.
translation.es: que la onda explosiva recoja en el camino.

translation.en: And as it moves through different people,
translation.es: Y a medida que pasa por distintas personas,

translation.en: it can carry bits of one person
translation.es: puede transportar trozos de una persona

translation.en: into another.
translation.es: a otra.

translation.en: So, you end up with very complex wounds
translation.es: Así que terminas con heridas muy complejas

translation.en: where bits of somebody's leg can end up… end up in their chest,
translation.es: en las que partes de la pierna de alguien pueden terminar en su pecho,

translation.en: or they can end up in the chest of the next person.
translation.es: o pueden terminar en el pecho de la siguiente persona.

translation.en: We had never seen anything quite like this before.
translation.es: Nunca habíamos visto algo así.

translation.en: You join me in the heart of Brixton where the mood is one of rising anger
translation.es: Estamos en el corazón de Brixton, donde el ambiente es de creciente ira

translation.en: against whoever was responsible for the nail bomb.
translation.es: contra el responsable de la bomba de clavos.

translation.en: [man 7] Brixton is a very tense area.
translation.es: Brixton es un área muy tensa.

translation.en: We just want to sort out what happened Saturday,
translation.es: Solo queremos aclarar qué pasó el sábado

translation.en: and we take it from there.
translation.es: y ya veremos luego.

translation.en: With me now is Mike Franklin.
translation.es: Me acompaña Mike Franklin.

translation.en: He's from the community police consultative group.
translation.es: Es del grupo asesor de la Policía comunitaria.

translation.en: Mike, I've seen today how high tensions are running here.
translation.es: Mike, he visto hoy lo tensa que es la situación aquí.

translation.en: Yes, uh, people are angry.
translation.es: Sí, la gente está enojada.

translation.en: This was a-- a-- a cowardly, callous attack on innocent people
translation.es: Este fue un ataque cobarde y cruel contra gente inocente

translation.en: going about their lawful daily business in Brixton on Saturday.
translation.es: que realizaba sus actividades legítimas en Brixton el sábado.

translation.en: Limbs amputated,
translation.es: Extremidades amputadas,

translation.en: shredding injuries from-- from-- from nails.
translation.es: heridas rasgadoras a causa de los clavos.

translation.en: People that-- deafened, blinded.
translation.es: Gente ensordecida, cegada.

translation.en: It wasn't a bomb, a bit of a loud noise down the road.
translation.es: No fue una bomba que solo hiciera un ruido fuerte.

translation.en: This was-- This-this ruined people's lives.
translation.es: Esto arruinó la vida de la gente.

translation.en: Police were very, very careful not to jump to conclusions.
translation.es: La Policía tuvo cuidado de no sacar conclusiones precipitadas.

translation.en: You know, they wanted to say, "We're keeping an open mind
translation.es: Querían decir: "Tenemos la mente abierta

translation.en: about what the motivation of this is."
translation.es: sobre la motivación de esto".

translation.en: I thought it was a racist attack.
translation.es: Me pareció un ataque racista.

translation.en: Instinctively.
translation.es: Por instinto.

translation.en: You live-- live down here and that happens, and you normally have an idea.
translation.es: Vives aquí y eso pasa, y normalmente tienes idea.

translation.en: And you had police officers saying things to you like, you know,
translation.es: Y la policía te decía cosas como:

translation.en: "We wanna catch the bomber as much as you do."
translation.es: "Queremos atrapar al terrorista tanto como tú".

translation.en: And you'd say to them, "No, no, you don't, because, like, where do you live?"
translation.es: Y uno decía: "No es cierto, porque ¿dónde vives?

translation.en: "You're not living in an area that's a target for this."
translation.es: No vives en un área que sea blanco de esto".

translation.en: And the fact that the bomber didn't kill anybody the first time around,
translation.es: Que el terrorista no matara a nadie la primera vez…

translation.en: there's a possibility he might come back.
translation.es: Cabe la posibilidad de que vuelva.

translation.en: [man 8] You know, London had had bombings before.
translation.es: Ya había habido ataques con bombas en Londres.

translation.en: The IRA campaigns, you know, weren't that distant a memory.
translation.es: Las campañas del IRA no eran un recuerdo lejano.

translation.en: [reporter 1] This morning, evidence taken from the wrecked building
translation.es: Esta mañana, el escuadrón de bombas revisa minuciosamente

translation.en: is being minutely examined by the bomb squad.
translation.es: las pruebas tomadas del edificio destruido.

translation.en: One theory is that the attack
translation.es: Una teoría es que el ataque

translation.en: was a calculated act of defiance by the IRA
translation.es: fue un acto deliberado de rebeldía por parte del IRA

translation.en: after the discovery in Southampton…
translation.es: tras el descubrimiento en Southampton…

translation.en: But what we hadn't had experience of
translation.es: Pero lo que no habíamos tenido antes

translation.en: was a bomb of that type
translation.es: era una bomba de ese tipo

translation.en: in the middle of a pedestrianized shopping high street.
translation.es: en medio de una calle comercial peatonal.

translation.en: Annette, hi. Simon Foy here.
translation.es: Annette, hola. Soy Simon Foy.

translation.en: I was the young, fresh-faced, inexperienced,
translation.es: Yo era el joven, novato, inexperto,

translation.en: quite aspiring,
translation.es: muy ambicioso,

translation.en: probably slightly naive
translation.es: y quizá un poco ingenuo,

translation.en: potential commander to Brixton Division.
translation.es: jefe en ciernes de la División de Brixton.

translation.en: It was the most challenging place to… to work.
translation.es: Era el lugar más difícil para trabajar.

translation.en: It was quite a tense atmosphere.
translation.es: Era un ambiente muy tenso.

translation.en: There was lots and lots of speculation
translation.es: Hubo muchas especulaciones

translation.en: about what was going on and who was responsible for it.
translation.es: sobre lo que estaba pasando y quién era el responsable.

translation.en: A whole load of reasons went through my mind.
translation.es: Se me ocurrieron muchas razones.

translation.en: We knew there was some gang violence brewing up,
translation.es: Sabíamos que se gestaba una violencia de pandillas

translation.en: and there had been some shootings fairly recently.
translation.es: y había habido tiroteos recientemente.

translation.en: Was it that?
translation.es: ¿Era eso?

translation.en: And people were sort of saying, "Come on, then…"
translation.es: Y la gente decía: "Vamos.

translation.en: You know, "What are you gonna do about it?"
translation.es: ¿Qué harás al respecto?".

translation.en: [man 9] Don't you think, sir, it is time
translation.es: ¿No cree, señor, que ya es hora

translation.en: to come clean and say you have not got enough police officers
translation.es: de ser sincero y decir que no tiene suficientes agentes de policía

translation.en: to do the job that is necessary within this community?
translation.es: para hacer el trabajo necesario en esta comunidad?

translation.en: [Franklin] People felt under-protected and over-policed.
translation.es: La gente se sentía desprotegida y vigilada.

translation.en: We'd all been through the Brixton riots of '81.
translation.es: Todos vivimos los disturbios de Brixton del 81.

translation.en: Deaths in custody, we'd been through all that stuff,
translation.es: Muertes de detenidos… Pasamos por todo eso,

translation.en: so a lot of us in the community weren't that happy or comfortable
translation.es: así que a muchos en la comunidad no nos alegraba ni nos gustaba la idea

translation.en: working with the police, 'cause we didn't trust them.
translation.es: de trabajar con la Policía, pues no confiábamos en ellos.

translation.en: [man 10] The police are harassing members of our community through stop and search.
translation.es: La Policía acosa a miembros de la comunidad mediante cacheos.

translation.en: The police announced that they're going to swamp our area
translation.es: La Policía anunció que invadirá nuestra área

translation.en: because of the bombing.
translation.es: debido al ataque con bomba.

translation.en: [Franklin] Police stop and search was a real issue when I was young growing up.
translation.es: Los cacheos de la Policía eran un grave problema cuando era joven.

translation.en: Going into Brixton on a Saturday afternoon with friends,
translation.es: Cuando iba a Brixton las tardes de sábado con amigos,

translation.en: to record shops, things like that.
translation.es: a tiendas de discos, cosas así.

translation.en: One of the things that would happen most Saturdays
translation.es: Una de las cosas que pasaban los sábados

translation.en: is you'd be stopped and searched by the police.
translation.es: era que te cacheaba la Policía.

translation.en: [reporter 2] The senior policeman who runs this area was telling me that the advice he'd give you lot
translation.es: El policía sénior que dirige esta área me dijo hoy que el consejo que les daba

translation.en: is to think seriously about joining the police force.
translation.es: era que consideraran seriamente unirse a la Policía.

translation.en: -He hasn't got enough-- -[youths laughing]
translation.es: No tiene suficientes…

translation.en: [Franklin] Friends got taken to the police station, come out with bruises,
translation.es: Llevaban a mis amigos a la comisaría y salían con cardenales.

translation.en: and they'd tell you they got punched in the face by a police officer.
translation.es: Contaban que un policía los golpeó en la cara.

translation.en: That was-- That was fairly normal.
translation.es: Eso era bastante normal.

translation.en: Those were the things that sowed the seeds of antipathy
translation.es: Eso fue lo que sembró la semilla de antipatía

translation.en: between the community and the police.
translation.es: entre la comunidad y la Policía.

translation.en: Now to the day's other news.
translation.es: Ahora a las otras noticias del día.

translation.en: Detectives investigating yesterday's bomb explosion
translation.es: Los detectives que investigan la explosión de ayer

translation.en: in Brixton in South London
translation.es: en Brixton, al sur de Londres,

translation.en: say they're keeping an open mind about who planted the device.
translation.es: dicen que mantienen la mente abierta sobre quién colocó el dispositivo.

translation.en: The attack has not been linked to a known terrorist group.
translation.es: El ataque no se ha vinculado a un grupo terrorista conocido.

translation.en: Were you here last Saturday?
translation.es: ¿Estabas aquí el sábado?

translation.en: [man 11] We've had lots of people that have come forward,
translation.es: Mucha gente que se ha presentado,

translation.en: uh, but no one has been able to tell us
translation.es: pero nadie ha podido decirnos

translation.en: anything particular, uh, about the bomber at this moment in time.
translation.es: nada en especial sobre el terrorista en este momento.

translation.en: [man 12] No one really had a clue of anything.
translation.es: Nadie tenía idea de nada.

translation.en: Was it a group of people? Was it one person?
translation.es: ¿Fue un grupo de personas? ¿Fue una persona?

translation.en: It created real fear.
translation.es: Creó mucho miedo.

translation.en: The police were not really monitoring the far right at that time.
translation.es: La Policía no vigilaba a la extrema derecha en ese entonces.

translation.en: They say they were and people were getting picked up every now and then,
translation.es: Dicen que sí y detenían gente de vez en cuando,

translation.en: but there was a mindset at the top of the security services
translation.es: pero la actitud en lo más alto de los servicios de seguridad

translation.en: saying that the far right weren't a threat.
translation.es: era que la extrema derecha no era un riesgo.

translation.en: They just wrote about these things, they weren't going to carry it out.
translation.es: Solo escribían sobre esto. No lo llevarían a cabo.

translation.en: You know, just a bunch of hooligans. Why are we having to look at these people?
translation.es: Ya sabes, son un montón de hooligans. ¿Para qué vigilarlos?

translation.en: Searchlight was a private intelligence operation.
translation.es: Searchlight era una operación de inteligencia privada.

translation.en: We infiltrated and monitored fascist groups.
translation.es: Nos infiltramos en grupos fascistas y los monitoreamos.

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Rights for whites! Rights for whites!
translation.es: ¡Los derechos de los blancos!

translation.en: [man 12] We'd been warning about it for years.
translation.es: Llevábamos años advirtiendo sobre eso.

translation.en: Terrorist movement defending the last stand,
translation.es: El movimiento terrorista defendía la última posición,

translation.en: taking on the system.
translation.es: se enfrentaba al sistema.

translation.en: Kind of an underground guerrilla army.
translation.es: Un tipo de guerrilla clandestina.

translation.en: And it was all about terrorism. All about killing people.
translation.es: Y era puro terrorismo. Se trataba de matar gente.

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Sieg Hiel! Sieg Hiel!
translation.es: ¡Sieg Hiel!

translation.en: [man 12] These were dangerous times, and we wanted to stop these people.
translation.es: Eran tiempos peligrosos, y queríamos detener a esta gente.

translation.en: The more we can find out what they're up to, the more we can… stop what they're doing,
translation.es: Cuanto más sepamos qué traman, más podremos detenerlos,

translation.en: draw attention to what they're doing.
translation.es: exponer lo que están haciendo.

translation.en: And then, we were contacted by someone
translation.es: Y luego, alguien se comunicó con nosotros

translation.en: volunteering to get involved.
translation.es: y se ofreció a participar.

translation.en: Hello, Searchlight.
translation.es: Hola. Searchlight.

translation.en: Said he was a young lad in his early 20s, who was political,
translation.es: Dijo que era un joven de unos 20 años y que era político

translation.en: very, very anti-racist.
translation.es: y muy antirracista.

translation.en: Obviously, from my perspective, the best thing he could do
translation.es: Y, claro, a mi parecer, lo mejor que podía hacer

translation.en: was to go inside the far right.
translation.es: era ingresar a la extrema derecha.

translation.en: And that's what he did.
translation.es: Y eso fue lo que hizo.

translation.en: [man 1] Is it important to still keep your identity a secret?
translation.es: ¿Aún es importante mantener tu identidad oculta?

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: 'Cause, like, these guys really are dangerous.
translation.es: Porque estos tipos son peligrosos.

translation.en: [man 1] And they still believe that you're a Nazi?
translation.es: ¿Y aún creen que eres nazi?

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [man 1] Why did you do it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo hiciste?

translation.en: [man 2] I like being a spy. It's, um…
translation.es: Me gusta ser espía. Es…

translation.en: It's a buzz.
translation.es: Es emocionante.

translation.en: [man 1] Can you start at the beginning, Arthur?
translation.es: ¿Puedes empezar desde el principio, Arthur?

translation.en: [Arthur] In 1999, I was undercover in the BNP.
translation.es: En 1999, estuve infiltrado en el Partido Nacional Británico.

translation.en: [Tyndall] For the new century, we need a new ideal,
translation.es: Para el nuevo siglo, necesitamos un nuevo ideal,

translation.en: a new kind of politics.
translation.es: un nuevo tipo de política.

translation.en: [Arthur] The British National Party was the law and order party.
translation.es: El Partido Nacional Británico era el partido de la ley y el orden.

translation.en: [Tyndall] We must stop immigration,
translation.es: Debemos parar la inmigración,

translation.en: and we must help the immigrants return home.
translation.es: y debemos ayudar a los inmigrantes a volver a casa.

translation.en: [Arthur] We projected ourselves as being decent,
translation.es: Dábamos la imagen de ciudadanos decentes,

translation.en: honorable, law-abiding citizens.
translation.es: honorables y respetuosos de la ley.

translation.en: We were the good guys.
translation.es: Éramos los buenos.

translation.en: To build a movement, which in the coming century
translation.es: Para crear un movimiento que en el próximo siglo

translation.en: will put the "great" back into Britain.
translation.es: volverá a hacer grande a la Gran Bretaña.

translation.en: [Arthur] But behind that,
translation.es: Pero detrás de eso,

translation.en: you'd be going to, like, a BNP meeting
translation.es: ibas a reuniones del Partido Nacional Británico

translation.en: at a church hall or, like, a back room of a pub.
translation.es: en el salón de la iglesia o en la trastienda de un bar.

translation.en: Fuck off.
translation.es: Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: [Arthur] And people were, like, distributing hit lists,
translation.es: Y la gente distribuía listas negras,

translation.en: overtly Nazi propaganda,
translation.es: propaganda abiertamente nazi,

translation.en: bomb manuals.
translation.es: manuales de bombas.

translation.en: It was their dream that someone would go out and blow up
translation.es: Su sueño era que alguien saliera e hiciera explotar

translation.en: someone they've suggested to target.
translation.es: a alguien a quien habían sugerido atacar.

translation.en: So, it was pretty extreme.
translation.es: Era bastante extremo.

translation.en: My assumption was
translation.es: Yo suponía

translation.en: that they'd keep the Nazi thing
translation.es: que mantendrían la cuestión nazi

translation.en: out of the way for new recruits,
translation.es: inaccesible para los nuevos reclutas,

translation.en: but straight away they were saying killing Jews was a good thing.
translation.es: pero enseguida dijeron que matar judíos era algo bueno.

translation.en: -[man 1] First day? -[Arthur] First day, yeah.
translation.es: ¿El primer día? El primer día, sí.

translation.en: [man 1] What did you think?
translation.es: ¿Qué te pareció?

translation.en: [Arthur] The thing was, I was shocked. I was scared, but I was also excited.
translation.es: Me sorprendió. Tenía miedo, pero también estaba emocionado.

translation.en: And also, like, the fact that they were so overtly Nazi,
translation.es: Y también el hecho de que eran tan abiertamente nazis

translation.en: that's more reason to carry on, isn't it?
translation.es: era más razón para seguir, ¿no?

translation.en: [man 1] Did you feel people were checking you out? Were they sussing you out?
translation.es: ¿Sentías que te estaban vigilando? ¿Te estaban calando?

translation.en: [Arthur] Not really, no.
translation.es: En realidad, no.

translation.en: I guess they were thinking that
translation.es: Supongo que pensaban que

translation.en: why wouldn't any white man want to join their organization?
translation.es: por qué un hombre blanco no querría unirse a su organización.

translation.en: [Arthur] Obviously, the anti-fascists had no idea I was on their side.
translation.es: Obviamente, los antifascistas no sabían que estaba de su lado.

translation.en: So, there were a few times I got whacked.
translation.es: Así que me golpearon unas cuantas veces.

translation.en: The worst time was actually-- It was, like, a girl,
translation.es: El peor momento fue cuando una chica

translation.en: and, um, like, she was smashing me over the head with, I think, a hammer.
translation.es: me golpeó la cabeza con lo que creo que era un martillo.

translation.en: This was my reality.
translation.es: Esta era mi realidad.

translation.en: [Boland] What do you believe in, son?
translation.es: ¿En qué crees, muchacho?

translation.en: [suspect] We've got so many poor white people in this country.
translation.es: Hay mucha gente blanca pobre en este país.

translation.en: You get all this bullshit,
translation.es: Escuchas todas esas tonterías

translation.en: everything has to be equal, everything this…
translation.es: de que todo debe ser igual, todo esto…

translation.en: It just puts white--
translation.es: Pone a la gente blanca…

translation.en: It demeans the white man in this country now.
translation.es: Degrada al hombre blanco de este país.

translation.en: People like me.
translation.es: Gente como yo.

translation.en: [Boland] So, you wanted to put some bombs down?
translation.es: Así que ¿querías poner unas bombas?

translation.en: [suspect] Yeah, yeah. As many as I could.
translation.es: Sí. Tantas como pudiera.

translation.en: One a week.
translation.es: Una por semana.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Why did you put nails in them?
translation.es: ¿Por qué les pusiste clavos?

translation.en: [suspect] It means they'd smash windows, stick into people, and maim people.
translation.es: Significa que romperían ventanas, se incrustarían en la gente, la mutilarían.

translation.en: And kill people.
translation.es: Y matarían gente.

translation.en: [reporter 3] The second weekend in the capital,
translation.es: Por segundo fin de semana en la capital,

translation.en: it appears that ethnic communities have once again been targeted
translation.es: parece que las comunidades étnicas están siendo atacadas

translation.en: in an attack without any warning.
translation.es: en un atentado sin aviso.

translation.en: [reporter 4] Brick Lane is sealed off tonight, and as well as a sense of shock,
translation.es: Brick Lane sigue cerrado esta noche y, además de la estupefacción,

translation.en: there's also a sense of relief that nobody was actually killed.
translation.es: también hay alivio de que nadie haya muerto.

translation.en: This strikes at the heart of the-- the Bengali community.
translation.es: Esto hiere a la comunidad bengalí donde más le duele.

translation.en: We have a problem, which is tantamount to racial terrorism.
translation.es: Hay un problema equivalente al terrorismo racial.

translation.en: These things are… are outrageous, that we will not tolerate,
translation.es: Esto es inaceptable y no lo toleraremos… PRIMER MINISTRO BRITÁNICO

translation.en: and we'll make every effort to find out who-- those responsible.
translation.es: …y haremos lo posible por averiguar quiénes son los responsables.

translation.en: They'll be prosecuted and brought to justice. No doubt about that.
translation.es: Serán procesados y llevados ante la justicia. Sin duda.

translation.en: With me is Siddy Shivdasani, who's the editor of Eastern Eye newspaper.
translation.es: Me acompaña Siddy Shivdasani, editor del diario Eastern Eye.

translation.en: We've received, uh, death threats even today at our offices.
translation.es: Recibimos amenazas de muerte, incluso hoy, en las oficinas.

translation.en: We actually warned our readers last week.
translation.es: Advertimos a los lectores la semana pasada

translation.en: if you live in a Black or Asian area to be aware.
translation.es: que tuvieran cuidado si viven en un área negra o asiática.

translation.en: Whilst politicians and the police
translation.es: Mientras los políticos y la Policía

translation.en: were dithering about whether it was a racial crime,
translation.es: dudaban si era un crimen racial,

translation.en: in the meantime, they were planning their next attack.
translation.es: ellos planeaban su siguiente ataque.

translation.en: [Shivdasani] I was just trying to get my message out there
translation.es: Solo intentaba transmitir mi mensaje

translation.en: of my personal frustration with the police.
translation.es: sobre mi frustración personal con la Policía.

translation.en: You know, try and do the right thing.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Intentaba hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: That's what I was trying to do then, to do the right thing.
translation.es: Eso es lo que intentaba hacer, lo correcto.

translation.en: I was editor of a British Asian paper at the time.
translation.es: En ese entonces, era editor de un periódico británico-asiático.

translation.en: We faced a fair bit of racism.
translation.es: Nos enfrentábamos a bastante racismo.

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, you just got used to it after a while, and it was just a bit mindless, really.
translation.es: Te acostumbrabas después de un tiempo y era un poco tonto, en realidad.

translation.en: But then we got this letter.
translation.es: Pero luego recibimos una carta.

translation.en: It was from some group called the White Wolves.
translation.es: Era de un grupo llamado los Lobos Blancos.

translation.en: I knew that an Asian area was gonna be targeted next. I felt it.
translation.es: Sabía que el área asiática sería el próximo objetivo. Lo sentía.

translation.en: But the police gave us no advice to look for anything suspicious
translation.es: Pero la Policía no nos aconsejó buscar algo sospechoso

translation.en: or to be vigilant. Nothing.
translation.es: ni estar alertas. Nada.

translation.en: We felt like they didn't give a fuck.
translation.es: Sentimos que les importaba un carajo.

translation.en: The homemade bomb that exploded in South London on Saturday
translation.es: La bomba casera que explotó en el sur de Londres el sábado

translation.en: seemed to have been an act of lunacy.
translation.es: parece ser un acto de locura.

translation.en: Tonight, you can help, and this is how.
translation.es: Esta noche, puedes ayudar, y así es cómo.

translation.en: This is the quantity of nails packed around the explosives.
translation.es: Esta es la cantidad de clavos comprimidos en torno a los explosivos.

translation.en: Who bought this lot?
translation.es: ¿Quién los compró?

translation.en: It wasn't a regular customer, wasn't a regular builder.
translation.es: No fue un cliente ni un constructor normales.

translation.en: Who came in for this sort of quantity of nails?
translation.es: ¿Quién compró esta cantidad de clavos?

translation.en: Alan Fry is head of the Anti-Terrorist branch.
translation.es: Alan Fry es el jefe de la rama antiterrorista.

translation.en: Alan, has it taken you any further, what you've got so far? Do you know?
translation.es: ¿Sabes si han avanzado con lo que tienen hasta ahora?

translation.en: I'm-- I'm sure it has,
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que sí,

translation.en: although it's-- it's too soon, uh, to be able to, uh, be particular
translation.es: aunque es demasiado pronto para dar detalles

translation.en: in regard to a-- a particular line of inquiry.
translation.es: respecto de una línea específica de investigación.

translation.en: Well, if there's any way that you think you can help, please, please do.
translation.es: Si creen poder ayudar de alguna forma, por favor, háganlo.

translation.en: There's a £10,000 reward. That may go up.
translation.es: Hay una recompensa de 10 000 libras. Podría aumentar.

translation.en: [woman 2] There weren't many serial killers in this country,
translation.es: No había muchos asesinos en serie en este país,

translation.en: let alone there'd never been a serial bomber.
translation.es: y mucho menos había habido un terrorista en serie.

translation.en: You know, people were afraid.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? La gente tenía miedo.

translation.en: People were afraid.
translation.es: La gente tenía miedo.

translation.en: I was the senior investigating officer.
translation.es: Yo era la agente investigadora sénior.

translation.en: The responsibility was huge.
translation.es: La responsabilidad era enorme.

translation.en: I had no experience in-- in terrorism investigation.
translation.es: No tenía experiencia en investigación de terrorismo.

translation.en: It brought the pressure to a different-- a completely different level.
translation.es: Aumentó la presión a un nivel completamente diferente.

translation.en: [reporter 5] Police are viewing hours of tape from closed-circuit TV cameras
translation.es: La policía está viendo horas de grabación de cámaras de TV de circuito cerrado,

translation.en: in the hope that the person who planted the device will have been caught on film and someone may recognize them.
translation.es: esperando que quien colocó el dispositivo haya sido filmado y alguien lo reconozca.

translation.en: The quality of the CCTV in 1999
translation.es: En 1999, la calidad de la TV de circuito cerrado

translation.en: wasn't great.
translation.es: no era muy buena.

translation.en: However, we started to find images
translation.es: Sin embargo, empezamos a encontrar imágenes

translation.en: that-- that might be the bomber.
translation.es: que podrían ser del terrorista.

translation.en: There was someone wearing a white baseball cap
translation.es: Había alguien con una gorra de béisbol blanca

translation.en: who was carrying over their shoulder
translation.es: que llevaba al hombro

translation.en: what appeared to be a sports bag.
translation.es: lo que parecía ser una bolsa de deporte.

translation.en: The only difficulty was
translation.es: La única dificultad era

translation.en: he wasn't recognizable.
translation.es: que no era reconocible.

translation.en: We went to all sorts of different agencies.
translation.es: Acudimos a todo tipo de agencias.

translation.en: We even went to the Americans and-- and the military.
translation.es: Incluso acudimos a los norteamericanos y a las fuerzas armadas.

translation.en: I mean, we sent it out there hoping,
translation.es: La enviamos con la esperanza

translation.en: uh, that-- that someone could enhance it.
translation.es: de que alguien pudiera hacerla más nítida.

translation.en: Um, they couldn't.
translation.es: No pudieron.

translation.en: We had to just keep looking.
translation.es: Teníamos que seguir buscando.

translation.en: I started working with the police.
translation.es: Empecé a colaborar con la Policía.

translation.en: I mean, I did joint press conferences.
translation.es: Hice conferencias de prensa conjuntas.

translation.en: So, when they produced this picture of an individual
translation.es: Cuando me mostraron la foto de alguien

translation.en: who may be the bomber,
translation.es: que podría ser el terrorista,

translation.en: there was arguments with me about whether it should be published.
translation.es: discutieron conmigo sobre si debía publicarse.

translation.en: Because it's grainy.
translation.es: Porque se ve borrosa.

translation.en: Um, it's an inconclusive picture.
translation.es: Es una fotografía no concluyente.

translation.en: My view was, "No. If that was a member of somebody's family, they'd know it."
translation.es: Mi opinión era: "No. Si fuera pariente de alguien, lo sabrían.

translation.en: "Put it out now. Put it out today."
translation.es: Publíquenla ahora. Hoy".

translation.en: "We can't do that."
translation.es: "No podemos hacerlo".

translation.en: I said, "Well, while you're prevaricating,
translation.es: Dije: "Mientras ustedes se andan con rodeos,

translation.en: the bomber is preparing the next bomb."
translation.es: el terrorista prepara la próxima bomba.

translation.en: "It's urgent. Put it out now."
translation.es: Es urgente. Publíquenla ahora.

translation.en: "Don't waste time."
translation.es: No pierdan el tiempo.

translation.en: "What are you gonna say to me if a bomb goes off while we're here having this conversation?"
translation.es: ¿Qué me dirán si explota una bomba mientras estamos aquí hablando?

translation.en: "And I'm telling people that you could've stopped it."
translation.es: Y le digo a la gente que podrían haberlo detenido.

translation.en: "Put the fucking picture out."
translation.es: Publiquen la puta foto".

translation.en: But nobody did.
translation.es: Pero nadie lo hizo.

translation.en: [man 12] Police were coming to us, "Had we heard anything?
translation.es: La Policía nos preguntó si oímos algo,

translation.en: What was our view?"
translation.es: qué opinábamos.

translation.en: We were asking people the same questions.
translation.es: Preguntábamos lo mismo a la gente.

translation.en: Who's going to be targeted next? Are people gonna get killed?
translation.es: ¿Quién será el próximo objetivo? ¿Matarán a alguien?

translation.en: By that stage, people were taking credit for it around the country. White Wolves.
translation.es: Para entonces, la gente se lo atribuía en todo el país. Los Lobos Blancos.

translation.en: There were letters were being circulated out of the East Midlands.
translation.es: Se enviaban cartas de las Tierras Medias Orientales.

translation.en: We went into overdrive. I remember at the time, it was like
translation.es: Nos pusimos a toda marcha. Recuerdo que pasábamos

translation.en: 24/7 trying to figure out who could it be.
translation.es: todo el día a diario intentando averiguar quién podría ser,

translation.en: Drawing up lists, who-who… who could have been doing this sort of thing?
translation.es: redactando listas: ¿quién podría haber hecho esto?

translation.en: No-- no one had heard anything.
translation.es: Nadie había escuchado nada.

translation.en: [man 1] What were you doing to try and find the bomber?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacías para intentar hallar al terrorista?

translation.en: I was just finding people.
translation.es: Solo buscaba gente.

translation.en: Pretending, first of all, that I was happy,
translation.es: Fingía, antes que nada, que estaba feliz,

translation.en: and I was saying, like, "Any idea who it is?"
translation.es: y preguntaba: "¿Tienen idea de quién es?".

translation.en: That sort of thing.
translation.es: Cosas así.

translation.en: But no one had a clue.
translation.es: Pero nadie tenía ni idea.

translation.en: No one had a clue.
translation.es: Nadie tenía ni idea.

translation.en: It's quite difficult to be in a situation where you're… you're spying on people
translation.es: Es muy difícil estar en una situación en la que espías a la gente

translation.en: and you-- you try to switch that-- that,
translation.es: e intentas cambiar eso,

translation.en: like, the voices off in your head,
translation.es: las voces en tu cabeza,

translation.en: but it's not easy.
translation.es: pero no es fácil.
Yo…

translation.en: I became immune to-- to the racism
translation.es: Me hice inmune al racismo

translation.en: and the fascism.
translation.es: y al fascismo.

translation.en: We'd-- we'd-- we'd look up to… heroes
translation.es: Admirábamos a héroes

translation.en: within our movement, like the Waffen SS,
translation.es: de nuestro movimiento, como las Waffen SS,

translation.en: Hitler, of course.
translation.es: Hitler, por supuesto.

translation.en: For a racist, it was an inspiring environment.
translation.es: Para un racista, era un ambiente inspirador.

translation.en: [man 1] Did you feel yourself being brainwashed?
translation.es: ¿Sentías que te lavaban el cerebro?

translation.en: [Arthur] I'd love to say I thought it was all bullshit.
translation.es: Me encantaría decir que creía que todo era una mierda.

translation.en: But--
translation.es: Pero…

translation.en: Yeah, definitely.
translation.es: sí, sin duda.

translation.en: Yeah, they indoctrinated me. Yeah.
translation.es: Sí, me adoctrinaron. Sí.

translation.en: It was like you--
translation.es: Es como si tú…

translation.en: Yes, I doubted the Holocaust happened.
translation.es: Sí, dudé que el Holocausto hubiera ocurrido.

translation.en: And I was even thinking
translation.es: Y hasta estaba pensando

translation.en: that maybe I was naive
translation.es: que tal vez era ingenuo

translation.en: if I followed the mainstream view
translation.es: si seguía la opinión convencional

translation.en: that it did happen.
translation.es: de que sí ocurrió.

translation.en: If they can get inside my head,
translation.es: Si podían manipularme a mí…

translation.en: imagine what it was doing to other people.
translation.es: imagínate lo que hacían con los demás.

translation.en: -Come on! -[crowd shouting]
translation.es: ¡Vamos!

translation.en: When you're ready!
translation.es: ¡Cuando estén listos!

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Rights for whites! Rights for whites!
translation.es: ¡Los derechos de los blancos!

translation.en: When you were in that bubble,
translation.es: Cuando estabas en esa burbuja…

translation.en: you were with like-minded people.
translation.es: estabas con gente de ideas afines.

translation.en: They had the same grievances as you,
translation.es: Tenían las mismas quejas que tú,

translation.en: they had the same background as you, a lot of them.
translation.es: los mismos antecedentes que tú, muchos de ellos.

translation.en: You were, like, insulated from reality.
translation.es: Estabas aislado de la realidad.

translation.en: I was part of it back then.
translation.es: Yo era parte de eso en ese entonces.

translation.en: This is our country!
translation.es: ¡Este es nuestro país!

translation.en: Our own race traitors,
translation.es: Traidores de nuestra propia raza

translation.en: who are trying to destroy this country,
translation.es: que intentan destruir este país…

translation.en: they are the enemy!
translation.es: ¡Ellos son el enemigo!

translation.en: [man 14] A guy called John Tyndall was our leader.
translation.es: Un tipo llamado John Tyndall era nuestro líder.

translation.en: He was a very high-profile right-wing politician at the time.
translation.es: Era un político de derecha muy prominente en ese entonces.

translation.en: Tyndall was a magnet for misfits,
translation.es: Tyndall era un imán para inadaptados,

translation.en: lunatics, and losers, really.
translation.es: lunáticos y perdedores, en realidad.

translation.en: That's what he wanted,
translation.es: Y eso quería,

translation.en: 'cause he could… he could control 'em.
translation.es: porque podía controlarlos.

translation.en: He would never say, "Go out and blow people up,"
translation.es: Nunca decía: "Ve a volar a la gente por los aires"

translation.en: or "Attack people," but he was very clever with words.
translation.es: ni "Ataca a la gente", pero era muy astuto con las palabras.

translation.en: His speeches were quite rousing, you know.
translation.es: Sus discursos eran muy provocadores.

translation.en: We will fight on, work on, march on, and struggle on
translation.es: ¡Lucharemos, trabajaremos, avanzaremos y nos esforzaremos

translation.en: to build a country for which they died
translation.es: para construir el país por el que murieron

translation.en: and give Britain back to the British people!
translation.es: y devolver la Gran Bretaña al pueblo británico!

translation.en: [man 14] We used to go to different meetings, and they were always in pubs.
translation.es: Solíamos ir a diferentes reuniones, y siempre eran en bares.

translation.en: And so, you had all these violent young men,
translation.es: Y a todos estos jóvenes violentos

translation.en: intoxicated,
translation.es: y ebrios

translation.en: being told that they're being threatened by these hordes of immigrants,
translation.es: se les decía que estaban siendo amenazados por hordas de inmigrantes

translation.en: and they're gonna murder you in your beds and rape your wife and eat your children.
translation.es: que los matarían en sus camas, violarían a sus esposas y se comerían a sus hijos.

translation.en: [man 14] After the meeting, there would always be violence.
translation.es: Tras la reunión, siempre había violencia. Siempre.

translation.en: -[rioter] Come on then, you wanker! -[cheering]
translation.es: ¡Vamos, idiota!

translation.en: Are you all right? Can I get vitals?
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? ¿Puedo tomar tus signos vitales?

translation.en: [man 14] You've got this rage inside you all the time, and…
translation.es: Sientes ira dentro de ti todo el tiempo, así como enfado y frustración.

translation.en: anger and frustration,
translation.es: así como enfado y frustración.

translation.en: and then it just--
translation.es: Y luego solo…

translation.en: You can-- you can spew it all out. You know what I mean?
translation.es: Puedes vomitarlo todo. ¿Me entiendes?

translation.en: You can vent it on someone else.
translation.es: Puedes desahogarte con alguien más.

translation.en: I remember after one particular meeting,
translation.es: Recuerdo que tras una reunión en particular,

translation.en: I had a transit van.
translation.es: tenía una camioneta tipo Transit.

translation.en: It toured the area
translation.es: Recorría el área

translation.en: and dragged Black people off the street.
translation.es: y sacaba a los negros de la calle.

translation.en: Kidnapped them, basically,
translation.es: Eran secuestrados, básicamente,

translation.en: and they were subjected to some pretty awful violence.
translation.es: y sometidos a una violencia terrible.

translation.en: If the BNP didn't have that meeting in the pub…
translation.es: Si el Partido Nacional Británico no se hubiera reunido en el bar…

translation.en: and tell everyone that they were under threat and in danger,
translation.es: y hubiera dicho a todos que estaban en riesgo y en peligro,

translation.en: they wouldn't have gone out attacking people.
translation.es: no habrían salido a atacar gente.

translation.en: You know, they-they incited them to do it, and then they'd wipe their mouth
translation.es: Los incitaban a hacerlo y luego se limpiaban la boca

translation.en: and go home to his…
translation.es: y se iban a sus mansiones de un millón de libras

translation.en: million-pound pile in Surrey or wherever it was and…
translation.es: y se iban a sus mansiones de un millón de libras en Surrey o donde fuera, y nosotros volvíamos a nuestras pocilgas en Stockwell.

translation.en: we'd go back to our shitholes in Stockwell, you know what I mean?
translation.es: y nosotros volvíamos a nuestras pocilgas en Stockwell. Y misión cumplida.

translation.en: Job done, then.
translation.es: Y misión cumplida.

translation.en: That's-- that's how it happens.
translation.es: Así es como sucede.

translation.en: That's how they manipulate people and use people, and--
translation.es: Así manipulan a la gente, la usan y…

translation.en: Yeah, I've done some pretty… pretty shit things, really.
translation.es: Sí, he hecho cosas terribles, en realidad.

translation.en: Really bad things.
translation.es: Cosas muy malas.

translation.en: [Johnstone] When did this come into your head that you wanted to do this?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo se te ocurrió que querías hacer esto?

translation.en: [suspect] Oh, don't know. A few years ago.
translation.es: No sé. Hace unos años.

translation.en: [Boland] 'Cause you're only 22 now, right? [suspect] Yeah, so I was about 20.
translation.es: - Porque apenas tienes 22 años, ¿no? - Sí, tenía unos 20 años.

translation.en: [Boland] You've heard in the newspaper, no doubt,
translation.es: Lo viste en el periódico, sin duda,

translation.en: and it's been printed, about this White… White Wolves organization.
translation.es: y se ha publicado, lo de la organización de los Lobos Blancos.

translation.en: [suspect] I don't know who they are. I-I don't know who they are.
translation.es: No sé quiénes son.

translation.en: I-I don't care who they are.
translation.es: No me importa quiénes son.

translation.en: [Boland] So, they would have no idea who you are?
translation.es: Así que no tienen ni idea de quién eres tú.

translation.en: [suspect] No. No idea at all.
translation.es: No. Ni idea.

translation.en: [Boland] So their claims are purely fictional?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿sus afirmaciones son ficticias?

translation.en: [suspect] Made up.
translation.es: Inventadas.

translation.en: Just trying to, you know, take my glory.
translation.es: Solo intentaban robarse mi gloria.

translation.en: [suspect] My aim was political. To cause a racial war in this country.
translation.es: Mi objetivo era político. Era causar una guerra racial en el país.

translation.en: [Johnstone] What does that mean?
translation.es: ¿Qué significa eso?

translation.en: [suspect] There'll be the uprising and all that.
translation.es: Habría un levantamiento y todo eso.

translation.en: You know, the racial violence in the street, whatever.
translation.es: Violencia racial en la calle. Lo que fuera.

translation.en: [Johnstone] What was your intention at that point?
translation.es: ¿Cuál era tu intención en ese momento?

translation.en: [suspect] I was thinking of a target I was gonna blow up.
translation.es: Pensaba en un objetivo que haría explotar.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Had you decided at this time where you were going to put the bomb?
translation.es: ¿Ya habías decidido dónde pondrías la bomba?

translation.en: [suspect] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [reporter 6] Two bomb attacks in London
translation.es: Dos ataques con bomba en Londres han causado, naturalmente,

translation.en: have understandably led to fears in the capital that there is more to come.
translation.es: Dos ataques con bomba en Londres han causado, naturalmente, temor en la capital de que haya más.

translation.en: Racists, we are told, were probably behind the bombs,
translation.es: Se dice que los racistas pusieron las bombas

translation.en: and they probably intend to strike again.
translation.es: y que quizá pretenden atacar de nuevo.

translation.en: [man 15] Nobody knew which community was gonna be targeted next.
translation.es: Nadie sabía qué comunidad sería el próximo objetivo.

translation.en: Would it be the Chinese community?
translation.es: ¿Sería la comunidad china?

translation.en: Would it be the Jewish community?
translation.es: ¿Sería la comunidad judía?

translation.en: There was a lot of discussion.
translation.es: Había mucha discusión.

translation.en: But the early conversations were all about race, all about ethnicity.
translation.es: Pero las primeras conversaciones eran sobre raza, sobre etnicidad.

translation.en: Nobody was thinking about, uh, the fact that this could go wider to the gay community.
translation.es: Nadie pensaba que esto podría extenderse a la comunidad gay.

translation.en: [man 15] The visible part of the gay community was in Soho,
translation.es: La parte visible de la comunidad gay estaba en Soho

translation.en: and probably Old Compton Street.
translation.es: y, probablemente, en Old Compton Street.

translation.en: You could kind of barhop
translation.es: Podías hacer un recorrido

translation.en: from one bar or one gay venue to another.
translation.es: e ir de un bar o sitio gay a otro.

translation.en: They were thriving, they were energetic,
translation.es: Eran prósperos, vigorosos,

translation.en: they were full of life.
translation.es: estaban llenos de vida.

translation.en: It felt very free.
translation.es: Se sentía mucha libertad.

translation.en: It felt as if you could be in those spaces and be yourself.
translation.es: Se sentía como si pudieras estar en esos espacios y ser tú mismo.

translation.en: When the second bomb went off, things became very clear very quickly.
translation.es: Cuando explotó la segunda bomba, todo se aclaró muy rápido.

translation.en: This was somebody who hated difference.
translation.es: Era alguien que odiaba la diferencia.

translation.en: They hate people who are different,
translation.es: Odian a la gente que es diferente,

translation.en: who-- who don't fit their perception of normal society.
translation.es: que no encaja con su percepción de la sociedad normal.

translation.en: We began having conversations with the police at quite a senior level.
translation.es: Comenzamos a hablar con la Policía a un nivel muy superior.

translation.en: We were told that it was a-- a racial issue.
translation.es: Nos dijeron que era un problema racial.

translation.en: And we raised our concerns, and it was met with some skepticism
translation.es: Y planteamos nuestras inquietudes, que fueron recibidas con escepticismo

translation.en: and some disbelief at Scotland Yard.
translation.es: y algo de recelo en Scotland Yard.

translation.en: So it was really pretty much down to us
translation.es: Así que dependía de nosotros

translation.en: to ring round the managers of the key venues,
translation.es: llamar a los gerentes de los lugares claves,

translation.en: the pubs, the clubs, the coffee bars, the restaurants, to say…
translation.es: los bares, los clubes, las cafeterías, los restaurantes, para decir…

translation.en: "This could come to us. Please be aware. Be vigilant."
translation.es: "Esto podría pasarnos a nosotros. Estén conscientes, estén alertas".

translation.en: We will defeat the people who are responsible for these bombs.
translation.es: Derrotaremos a los responsables de estas bombas.

translation.en: We will catch them.
translation.es: Los capturaremos.

translation.en: We don't have specific corroboration for any particular group,
translation.es: No tenemos corroboración específica de que ningún grupo en particular

translation.en: uh, who are responsible for these outrages,
translation.es: sea responsable de estos atentados,

translation.en: but clearly, it is-- it is most likely to be, um,
translation.es: pero, claramente, es muy probable que sean

translation.en: far-right extremists who are targeting minority groups.
translation.es: miembros de la extrema derecha que atacan a grupos minoritarios.

translation.en: [man 12] Everyone was kind of blind to it, 'cause no one knew where it was coming.
translation.es: Todos estaban ciegos porque nadie sabía de dónde vendría.

translation.en: But everyone was expecting for it to happen.
translation.es: Pero todos preveían que sucedería.

translation.en: I'd meet Arthur in places where we thought
translation.es: Me reunía con Arthur en sitios donde creíamos

translation.en: other people who knew him or knew me wouldn't be.
translation.es: que no habría otras personas que nos conocieran a él o a mí.

translation.en: Tourist hotels in London,
translation.es: Hoteles de turistas en Londres,

translation.en: meet outside London.
translation.es: sitios fuera de Londres.

translation.en: He understood what his mission was.
translation.es: Entendía cuál era su misión.

translation.en: And he understood that he had to stop them.
translation.es: Y entendía que tenía que detenerlos.

translation.en: [Arthur] I'd meet my contact
translation.es: Me reunía con mi contacto

translation.en: and go through all these names of people I knew already…
translation.es: y revisábamos todos los nombres de personas que yo ya conocía.

translation.en: and mentioned this guy
translation.es: Y mencioné a un tipo

translation.en: who I'd referred to as "Dave from Barking"
translation.es: al que llamaba "Dave de Barking",

translation.en: because he-- he mentioned that was where… where he was living.
translation.es: porque mencionó que allí vivía.

translation.en: We were a similar sort of age,
translation.es: Teníamos una edad similar,

translation.en: bonded a little bit,
translation.es: intimamos un poco,

translation.en: talked about music
translation.es: hablamos de música

translation.en: and the fact he didn't like people with brown faces very much.
translation.es: y del hecho de que no le agradaban mucho las personas de cara morena.

translation.en: I last saw him at the annual rally
translation.es: Lo vi por última vez en el mitin anual

translation.en: when, um, he was acting like a-a steward.
translation.es: cuando él fungía como representante.

translation.en: He had, like, a steward's armband. He stood next to John Tyndall.
translation.es: Tenía un brazalete de representante. Estaba junto a John Tyndall.

translation.en: I think Tyndall got quite badly beaten up by anti-fascists.
translation.es: Creo que los antifascistas golpearon muy duro a Tyndall.

translation.en: After that, Dave just, like, disappeared.
translation.es: Después de eso, Dave desapareció.

translation.en: And I didn't think anything of him.
translation.es: Y eso no me preocupó.

translation.en: [suspect] After Saturday at Brick Lane,
translation.es: Después del sábado en Brick Lane,

translation.en: I got a taxi to Soho to do a bit of recon.
translation.es: fui en taxi a Soho para hacer un reconocimiento.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Roughly what time would this have been? [suspect] Must've been about 7:00.
translation.es: - ¿Como a qué hora fue eso? - Como a las 7:00.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Right. So, what was your intention at that point?
translation.es: Y ¿cuál era tu intención en ese momento?

translation.en: [suspect] I was thinking what pub I was gonna blow up.
translation.es: Pensaba en qué bar iba a volar.

translation.en: I went down to Old Compton Street.
translation.es: Fui a Old Compton Street.

translation.en: I wanted to make sure it was the right pub 'cause I was after a queer one.
translation.es: Quería asegurarme de que fuera el bar correcto porque buscaba uno homo.

translation.en: A gay one or whatever you wanna call it.
translation.es: Uno gay o como quieras llamarlo.

translation.en: [Boland] Have you got a problem with gays, then?
translation.es: ¿Te molestan los gais?

translation.en: -[suspect] Yeah, I have. -[Boland] Why?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: [suspect] I'm just very homophobic.
translation.es: Soy muy homofóbico.

translation.en: That's pretty-- You know, I just hate 'em.
translation.es: Es muy… Simplemente, los odio.

translation.en: [Johnstone] Why? [suspect] I don't know. You just do.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - No lo sé. Porque sí, ¿sabes?

translation.en: [Johnstone] There must be a reason. [suspect] I got a thing about homosexuals.
translation.es: - Debe haber una razón. - Me molestan los homosexuales.

translation.en: I just don't like talking about it, you know what I mean?
translation.es: No me gusta hablar de eso, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: I chose the gays 'cause I hate them.
translation.es: Elegí a los gais porque los odio.

translation.en: You know? I mean, that was personal.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Eso es personal.

translation.en: [Johnstone] The tape doesn't pick this up, but when we speak to you about the gays,
translation.es: La cinta no capta esto, pero cuando hablamos contigo de los gais,

translation.en: you-- you have to close your eyes, and you seem quite intense there, David.
translation.es: tienes que cerrar los ojos y parecías muy vehemente, David.

translation.en: [David] Yeah. I just don't like them.
translation.es: Sí. No me agradan.

translation.en: I just don't like them, yeah?
translation.es: Simplemente, no me agradan, ¿sí?

translation.en: I'm completely straight. Don't worry about that.
translation.es: Soy totalmente heterosexual. No te preocupes.

translation.en: [Johnstone] No, no, no. It's not a problem, but it upsets you.
translation.es: No. No hay problema, pero te molesta.

translation.en: You know? I don't know why it upsets you.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? No sé por qué te molesta.

translation.en: It upset you enough to plant a bomb.
translation.es: Te molesta lo suficiente como para poner una bomba.

translation.en: But I don't know why.
translation.es: Pero no sé por qué.

translation.en: [reporter 7] After the two Saturday afternoon bombings in London,
translation.es: Tras los dos atentados del sábado por la tarde en Londres,

translation.en: police forces around the country are warning people
translation.es: la Policía en todo el país advierte a aquellos

translation.en: who could be potential targets to be vigilant this weekend.
translation.es: que podrían ser blancos que estén alertas este fin de semana.

translation.en: Detectives fear the Brick Lane and Brixton bombs
translation.es: Los detectives temen que las bombas de Brick Lane y Brixton

translation.en: could be the start of a nationwide racist terror campaign.
translation.es: sean el inicio en el país de una campaña terrorista racista.

translation.en: Police say they don't want to spread panic
translation.es: La Policía dice que no quiere causar pánico,

translation.en: but want everyone to be aware of the possible threat
translation.es: pero quiere que todos sepan de la posible amenaza

translation.en: of another bomb this bank holiday weekend.
translation.es: de otra bomba este fin de semana festivo.

translation.en: [Foy] There were two things that drew attention to the suspect.
translation.es: Hubo dos cosas que llamaron la atención hacia el sospechoso.

translation.en: Instead of looking at thousands of people,
translation.es: En vez de mirar a miles de personas,

translation.en: your job is to look at all those thousands of people who might be carrying a bag.
translation.es: tu trabajo es mirar a los miles de personas que quizá lleven una bolsa.

translation.en: And then once that bag was found, then there was the hat he was wearing.
translation.es: Y una vez que encontraron esa bolsa, vieron la gorra que llevaba.

translation.en: But there was hundreds and hundreds and hundreds and hundreds of hours.
translation.es: Pero había cientos y cientos y cientos de horas.

translation.en: [woman 2] At first, the images were so bad you couldn't tell who it was.
translation.es: Al principio, las imágenes eran tan malas que no se distinguía quién era.

translation.en: But then we started to find other images that were clearer.
translation.es: Pero luego empezamos a encontrar otras imágenes más nítidas.

translation.en: The guys were straight down at my office. "Boss, you've gotta see this."
translation.es: Los chicos fueron directo a mi oficina. "Jefa, tiene que ver esto".

translation.en: [Foy] I distinctly remember that moment.
translation.es: Recuerdo claramente ese momento.

translation.en: Here's the image. This is the bomber.
translation.es: Aquí está la imagen. Este es el terrorista.

translation.en: [reporter 8] Before rush hour, it was on posters at stations
translation.es: Antes de la hora pico, había carteles en las estaciones

translation.en: and other key locations across the capital.
translation.es: y otros sitios claves de la capital.

translation.en: The images have been posted on the internet
translation.es: Las imágenes se publicaron en línea

translation.en: and are being sent to every police force in the country.
translation.es: y se envían a todas las fuerzas policiales del país.

translation.en: [reporter 9] Even though the police suspect he may be behind the bombing,
translation.es: Aunque la Policía sospecha que podría ser el responsable del ataque,

translation.en: if he's watching this broadcast
translation.es: si ve esta transmisión

translation.en: and he honestly thinks he's innocent, then he should come forward.
translation.es: y cree que es inocente, debería presentarse.

translation.en: [David] I heard on the radio that you had pictures of me.
translation.es: Oí en la radio que tenían fotos mías.

translation.en: And at first, I thought, "That's it. I'm caught."
translation.es: Al principio, pensé: "Se acabó. Me atraparon".

translation.en: So, I've immediately gone straight home, and I've realized I ain't been caught yet.
translation.es: Me fui directo a casa y me di cuenta de que aún no me habían atrapado.

translation.en: I built my device, set the time, I packed it all up.
translation.es: Armé mi dispositivo, puse la hora y lo empaqué todo.

translation.en: Waited till about half past four, caught a taxi up to Soho.
